```{r}
n <-50
m <- 2000
intervals <- 500

x <- runif(n, min = 0, max = 6)
print(x)
```
```{r}
m <-10
bootstrap_matrix <- replicate(m, sample(x, replace = TRUE, size=n))
```
```{r}
T_i <- function (bootstrap_sample, arithmetic_mean) {
  return(sqrt(length(bootstrap_sample))*(mean(bootstrap_sample)-arithmetic_mean) / sd(bootstrap_sample))
}
```
```{r}
T <- apply(X=bootstrap_matrix,MARGIN =  1, FUN = T_i, arithmetic_mean=mean(x))
sort(T)
print(T)
```
```{r}
Quantile <- function (alpha, T, arithmetic_mean, standard_deviation, m){
  return(arithmetic_mean-standard_deviation*T[1-int(alpha*m)] * sqrt(m),
         arithmetic_mean-standard_deviation*T[int(alpha*m)] * sqrt(m))
}
```
